content: To obtain the Buddha's Right Hand (Material), you need to defeat Buddha's Right Hand (the boss) in Middle Hollow in The Webbed Hollow. This is a mandatory boss, so it can't be missed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand_(Material).md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand (Material)'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Buddha's Right Hand (Material), you need to defeat Buddha's Right Hand (the boss) in Middle Hollow in The Webbed Hollow. This is a mandatory boss, so it can't be missed.
